title: Enhancing the performance of heterogeneous palladium based catalysts in the mild reductive depolymerization of soda lignin through addition of a non-noble metal and tuning of the preparation strategy
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00054D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tibo De Saegher, Boyana Atanasova, Pieter Vermeir, Kevin M. Van Geem, Jeriffa De Clercq, An Verberckmoes, Jeroen Lauwaert
Addition of a non-noble metal and tuning of the preparation strategy, can dramatically reduce the synthesis costs of Pd nanoparticle catalysts while also increasing activity and steering product selectivity.
